org.springframework.data.repository.core.support

类 DefaultCrudMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.core.support.DefaultCrudMethods
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CrudMethods

    public class DefaultCrudMethods
extends Object
implements CrudMethods
    Default implementation to discover CRUD methods based on the given RepositoryMetadata. Will detect methods exposed in CrudRepository but also hand crafted CRUD methods that are signature compatible with the ones on CrudRepository.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.6

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DefaultCrudMethods(RepositoryMetadata metadata)
      Creates a new DefaultCrudMethods using the given RepositoryMetadata.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Optional<Method> getDeleteMethod()
      Returns the delete method of the repository.
      Optional<Method> getFindAllMethod()
      Returns the find all method of the repository.
      Optional<Method> getFindOneMethod()
      Returns the find one method of the repository.
      Optional<Method> getSaveMethod()
      Returns the method to be used for saving entities.
      boolean hasDelete()
      Returns whether the repository exposes a delete method.
      boolean hasFindAllMethod()
      Returns whether the repository exposes a find all method at all.
      boolean hasFindOneMethod()
      Returns whether the repository exposes a find one method.
      boolean hasSaveMethod()
      Returns whether the repository exposes a save method at all.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSaveMethod

        public Optional<Method> getSaveMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns the method to be used for saving entities. Usually signature compatible to CrudRepository.save(Object).
        指定者:
        getSaveMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:
        the method to save entities or Optional.empty() if none exposed.
        另请参阅:
        CrudMethods.hasSaveMethod()

      • hasSaveMethod

        public boolean hasSaveMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns whether the repository exposes a save method at all.
        指定者:
        hasSaveMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:

      • getFindAllMethod

        public Optional<Method> getFindAllMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns the find all method of the repository. Implementations should prefer more detailed methods like PagingAndSortingRepository's taking a Pageable or Sort instance.
        指定者:
        getFindAllMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:
        the find all method of the repository or Optional.empty() if not available.
        另请参阅:
        CrudMethods.hasFindAllMethod()

      • hasFindAllMethod

        public boolean hasFindAllMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns whether the repository exposes a find all method at all.
        指定者:
        hasFindAllMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:

      • getFindOneMethod

        public Optional<Method> getFindOneMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns the find one method of the repository. Usually signature compatible to CrudRepository.findById(Object)
        指定者:
        getFindOneMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:
        the find one method of the repository or Optional.empty() if not available.
        另请参阅:
        CrudMethods.hasFindOneMethod()

        返回:

      • getDeleteMethod

        public Optional<Method> getDeleteMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: CrudMethods
        Returns the delete method of the repository. Will prefer a delete-by-entity method over a delete-by-id method.
        指定者:
        getDeleteMethod 在接口中 CrudMethods
        返回:
        the delete method of the repository or Optional.empty() if not available.
        另请参阅:
        CrudMethods.hasDelete()
